about.details:
Incorporated in 2012, Vivo Collaboration offers a comprehensive suite of telephony services, covering voice-based solutions of enterprises. The company delivers end-to-end Cloud Telephony solutions. The company enables enterprises to break free from traditional PSTN-based communication and adopt IP voice applications.

Vivo provides a solid, scalable, yet simple converged platform for enterprise communication. Vivo uses robust TDM networks and MPLS cloud services for its solutions. The company's OPEX-based cloud platform caters to the specific needs of its diverse customer base. The company's services ensure zero communication loss and hence save precious management time.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Experienced management and motivated team
  • End-to-end cloud telephony services provider
  • One-window cloud access
  • Commitment to quality

faqs.question: What is the Vivo Collaboration IPO?
faqs.answer:
Vivo Collaboration IPO is a SME IPO of 536000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.40 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹82 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on December 20, 2021, and closes on December 23, 2021.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Vivo Collaboration IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Vivo Collaboration IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Vivo Collaboration IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Vivo Collaboration IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Vivo Collaboration IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Vivo Collaboration IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Vivo Collaboration IPO opens on December 20, 2021 and closes on December 23, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Vivo Collaboration IPO?
faqs.answer: Vivo Collaboration IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,31,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Vivo Collaboration IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Vivo Collaboration IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
